Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.","params":{"_item":"The data describing the item."}},"challengeRequest(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Challenges the request of the item. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.","params":{"_evidence":"A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.","_itemID":"The ID of the item which request to challenge."}},"changeArbitrator(address,bytes)":{"details":"Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes that may be raised. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.","params":{"_arbitrator":"The new trusted arbitrator to be used in disputes.","_arbitratorExtraData":"The extra data used by the new arbitrator."}},"changeConnectedTCR(address)":{"details":"Change the address of connectedTCR, the Generalized TCR instance that stores addresses of TCRs related to this one.","params":{"_connectedTCR":"The address of the connectedTCR contract to use."}},"changeGovernor(address)":{"details":"Change the governor of the curated registry.","params":{"_governor":"The address of the new governor."}},"changeLoserStakeMultiplier(uint256)":{"details":"Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.","params":{"_loserStakeMultiplier":"Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points."}},"changeMetaEvidence(string,string)":{"details":"Update the meta evidence used for disputes.","params":{"_clearingMetaEvidence":"The meta evidence to be used for future clearing request disputes.","_registrationMetaEvidence":"The meta evidence to be used for future registration request disputes."}},"changeRemovalBaseDeposit(uint256)":{"details":"Change the base amount required as a deposit to remove an item.","params":{"_removalBaseDeposit":"The new base amount of wei required to remove an item."}},"changeRemovalChallengeBaseDeposit(uint256)":{"details":"Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a removal request.","params":{"_removalChallengeBaseDeposit":"The new base amount of wei required to challenge a removal request."}},"changeSharedStakeMultiplier(uint256)":{"details":"Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by parties when there is no winner or loser.","params":{"_sharedStakeMultiplier":"Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points."}},"changeSubmissionBaseDeposit(uint256)":{"details":"Change the base amount required as a deposit to submit an item.","params":{"_submissionBaseDeposit":"The new base amount of wei required to submit an item."}},"changeSubmissionChallengeBaseDeposit(uint256)":{"details":"Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a submission.","params":{"_submissionChallengeBaseDeposit":"The new base amount of wei required to challenge a submission."}},"changeTimeToChallenge(uint256)":{"details":"Change the duration of the challenge period.","params":{"_challengePeriodDuration":"The new duration of the challenge period."}},"changeWinnerStakeMultiplier(uint256)":{"details":"Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the winner of the previous round.","params":{"_winnerStakeMultiplier":"Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points."}},"constructor":{"details":"Deploy the arbitrable curated registry.","params":{"_arbitrator":"Arbitrator to resolve potential disputes. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.","_arbitratorExtraData":"Extra data for the trusted arbitrator contract.","_challengePeriodDuration":"The time in seconds parties have to challenge a request.","_clearingMetaEvidence":"The URI of the meta evidence object for clearing requests.","_connectedTCR":"The address of the TCR that stores related TCR addresses. This parameter can be left empty.","_governor":"The trusted governor of this contract.","_registrationMetaEvidence":"The URI of the meta evidence object for registration requests.","_removalBaseDeposit":"The base deposit to remove an item.","_removalChallengeBaseDeposit":"The base deposit to challenge a removal request.","_stakeMultipliers":"Multipliers of the arbitration cost in basis points (see MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR) as follows: - The multiplier applied to each party's fee stake for a round when there is no winner/loser in the previous round (e.g. when the arbitrator refused to arbitrate). - The multiplier applied to the winner's fee stake for the subsequent round. - The multiplier applied to the loser's fee stake for the subsequent round.","_submissionBaseDeposit":"The base deposit to submit an item.","_submissionChallengeBaseDeposit":"The base deposit to challenge a submission."}},"executeRequest(bytes32)":{"details":"Executes an unchallenged request if the challenge period has passed.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the item to execute."}},"fundAppeal(bytes32,uint8)":{"details":"Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the item which request to fund.","_side":"The recipient of the contribution."}},"getContributions(bytes32,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a request.","params":{"_contributor":"The address of the contributor.","_itemID":"The ID of the item.","_request":"The request to query.","_round":"The round to query."},"return":"contributions The contributions."},"getItemInfo(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns item's information. Includes length of requests array.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the queried item."},"return":"data The data describing the item.status The current status of the item.numberOfRequests Length of list of status change requests made for the item."},"getRequestInfo(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Gets information on a request made for the item.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the queried item.","_request":"The request to be queried."},"return":"disputed True if a dispute was raised.disputeID ID of the dispute, if any..submissionTime Time when the request was made.resolved True if the request was executed and/or any raised disputes were resolved.parties Address of requester and challenger, if any.numberOfRounds Number of rounds of dispute.ruling The final ruling given, if any.arbitrator The arbitrator trusted to solve disputes for this request.arbitratorExtraData The extra data for the trusted arbitrator of this request.metaEvidenceID The meta evidence to be used in a dispute for this case."},"getRoundInfo(bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Gets the information of a round of a request.","params":{"_itemID":"The ID of the queried item.","_request":"The request to be queried.","_round":"The round to be queried."},"return":"appealed Whether appealed or not.amountPaid Tracks the sum paid for each Party in this round.hasPaid True if the Party has fully paid its fee in this round.feeRewards Sum of reimbursable fees and stake rewards available to the parties that made contributions to the side that ultimately wins a dispute."},"itemCount()":{"details":"Returns the number of items that were submitted. Includes items that never made it to the list or were later removed.","return":"count The number of items on the list."},"removeItem(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Submit a request to remove an item from the list. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.","params":{"_evidence":"A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.","_itemID":"The ID of the item to remove."}},"rule(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Accounts for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.","params":{"_disputeID":"ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.","_ruling":"Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for \"Refused to arbitrate\"."}},"submitEvidence(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.","params":{"_evidence":"A link to an evidence using its URI.","_itemID":"The ID of the item which the evidence is related to."}},"withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,bytes32,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportionally to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.","params":{"_beneficiary":"The address that made contributions to a request.","_itemID":"The ID of the item submission to withdraw from.","_request":"The request from which to withdraw from.","_round":"The round from which to withdraw from."}}},"title":"GeneralizedTCR This contract is a curated registry for any types of items. Just like a TCR contract it features the request-challenge protocol and appeal fees crowdfunding."},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"@kleros/tcr/contracts/GeneralizedTCR.sol":"GeneralizedTCR"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/IArbitrable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x68e90a06a982dfa968f3aa76ac519126b090707a07e6e984a69ccbc06b6c7cc0","urls":["bzz-raw://ce1d8253efda5757740ee16481ebb82374a85e8eef393c87f6c0a6f2b388db6f","dweb:/ipfs/QmUiQ1EHxVJmwCzqKzjwLAQrAFfQTxKnXHHv6vB75DjP22"]},"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/IArbitrator.sol":{"keccak256":"0x98e3799e61a5e1cc8c01426a56927ec23a8ff8f807751d5c5cc111da683b3f50","urls":["bzz-raw://9c4609c434bdc39620d619093b5610215b3978caf2e70ae3a81eaf19468bfc6b","dweb:/ipfs/QmNj3uku7FrFNzgRS3XfadyVAG6HzLvSTsTnEvUJB6poR3"]},"@kleros/erc-792/contracts/erc-1497/IEvidence.sol":{"keccak256":"0x15893e6624ef81491a1b25b915fd9d68d0ce20c6d7aa6ec4b58411717a23a5fe","urls":["bzz-raw://4945f185e4274eecd0f8c87a8d2efdf6898e3ba06749ea3d098e2741a73912f9","dweb:/ipfs/QmPZ5mt7Hq5aucoX2Cs4cRGjjfWJxWUib6kFUC9Vzsh2tD"]},"@kleros/tcr/contracts/GeneralizedTCR.sol":{"keccak256":"0x98516073bac0aec1841b502ea1f6a5d8df039173e7e0d29916b3a6003a737ea0","urls":["bzz-raw://8f2ebf29783f94b9ddcfbe62610b9ff80d4313875ac4324c36f20ab7db323dd2","dweb:/ipfs/QmQhhQ3BWe1BV8rmbsn6zLTmWduRkkpVDZVypRsS5yj226"]},"@kleros/tcr/contracts/utils/CappedMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x751c0bd8ab266404e71fd6ab1eea59a24239292ca43caa6c87c75985030061cc","urls":["bzz-raw://44bf2175b49b6e17b961b322dbc2ead6ed1a2010b2f0c4e47ab02cc3877a6ea0","dweb:/ipfs/QmYMG7MnX2Lq8bPsPr9doEmXKaKDvtHxTs8t1HRFqUEUL6"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
@title GeneralizedTCR
 This contract is a curated registry for any types of items. Just like a TCR contract it features the request-challenge protocol and appeal fees crowdfunding.
nodes.name: GeneralizedTCR

nodes.documentation:
@dev Emitted when the address of the connected TCR is set. The connected TCR is an instance of the Generalized TCR contract where each item is the address of a TCR related to this one.
 @param _connectedTCR The address of the connected TCR.

nodes.documentation:
@title GeneralizedTCR
 This contract is a curated registry for any types of items. Just like a TCR contract it features the request-challenge protocol and appeal fees crowdfunding.

addItem(bytes).details: Submit a request to register an item. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.

challengeRequest(bytes32,string).details: Challenges the request of the item. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.
params._itemID: The ID of the item which request to challenge.

changeArbitrator(address,bytes).details: Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes that may be raised. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.

params._arbitrator: The new trusted arbitrator to be used in disputes.
params._arbitratorExtraData: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

changeConnectedTCR(address).details: Change the address of connectedTCR, the Generalized TCR instance that stores addresses of TCRs related to this one.

params._connectedTCR: The address of the connectedTCR contract to use.

changeGovernor(address).details: Change the governor of the curated registry.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

changeLoserStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.

params._loserStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

changeMetaEvidence(string,string).details: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

params._clearingMetaEvidence: The meta evidence to be used for future clearing request disputes.
params._registrationMetaEvidence: The meta evidence to be used for future registration request disputes.

changeRemovalBaseDeposit(uint256).details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to remove an item.

params._removalBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to remove an item.

changeRemovalChallengeBaseDeposit(uint25.details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a removal request.

params._removalChallengeBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to challenge a removal request.

changeSharedStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by parties when there is no winner or loser.

params._sharedStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

changeSubmissionBaseDeposit(uint256).details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to submit an item.

params._submissionBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to submit an item.

changeSubmissionChallengeBaseDeposit(uin.details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a submission.

params._submissionChallengeBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to challenge a submission.

changeTimeToChallenge(uint256).details: Change the duration of the challenge period.

params._challengePeriodDuration: The new duration of the challenge period.

changeWinnerStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the winner of the previous round.

params._winnerStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

params._arbitrator: Arbitrator to resolve potential disputes. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.
params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the trusted arbitrator contract.
params._challengePeriodDuration: The time in seconds parties have to challenge a request.
params._clearingMetaEvidence: The URI of the meta evidence object for clearing requests.
params._connectedTCR: The address of the TCR that stores related TCR addresses. This parameter can be left empty.
params._governor: The trusted governor of this contract.
params._registrationMetaEvidence: The URI of the meta evidence object for registration requests.
params._removalBaseDeposit: The base deposit to remove an item.
params._removalChallengeBaseDeposit: The base deposit to challenge a removal request.
params._stakeMultipliers: Multipliers of the arbitration cost in basis points (see MULTIPLIER_DIVISOR) as follows: - The multiplier applied to each party's fee stake for a round when there is no winner/loser in the previous round (e.g. when the arbitrator refused to arbitrate). - The multiplier applied to the winner's fee stake for the subsequent round. - The multiplier applied to the loser's fee stake for the subsequent round.
params._submissionBaseDeposit: The base deposit to submit an item.
params._submissionChallengeBaseDeposit: The base deposit to challenge a submission.

executeRequest(bytes32).details: Executes an unchallenged request if the challenge period has passed.

params._itemID: The ID of the item to execute.

fundAppeal(bytes32,uint8).details: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded.

params._itemID: The ID of the item which request to fund.

getContributions(bytes32,uint256,uint256.details: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a request.

getItemInfo(bytes32).details: Returns item's information. Includes length of requests array.

params._itemID: The ID of the queried item.

getItemInfo(bytes32).return: data The data describing the item.status The current status of the item.numberOfRequests Length of list of status change requests made for the item.

getRequestInfo(bytes32,uint256).details: Gets information on a request made for the item.

params._itemID: The ID of the queried item.

getRequestInfo(bytes32,uint256).return: disputed True if a dispute was raised.disputeID ID of the dispute, if any..submissionTime Time when the request was made.resolved True if the request was executed and/or any raised disputes were resolved.parties Address of requester and challenger, if any.numberOfRounds Number of rounds of dispute.ruling The final ruling given, if any.arbitrator The arbitrator trusted to solve disputes for this request.arbitratorExtraData The extra data for the trusted arbitrator of this request.metaEvidenceID The meta evidence to be used in a dispute for this case.

getRoundInfo(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: Gets the information of a round of a request.

params._itemID: The ID of the queried item.

getRoundInfo(bytes32,uint256,uint256).return: appealed Whether appealed or not.amountPaid Tracks the sum paid for each Party in this round.hasPaid True if the Party has fully paid its fee in this round.feeRewards Sum of reimbursable fees and stake rewards available to the parties that made contributions to the side that ultimately wins a dispute.

itemCount().details: Returns the number of items that were submitted. Includes items that never made it to the list or were later removed.
itemCount().return: count The number of items on the list.

removeItem(bytes32,string).details: Submit a request to remove an item from the list. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to remove.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Accounts for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refused to arbitrate".

submitEvidence(bytes32,string).details: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI.
params._itemID: The ID of the item which the evidence is related to.

withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,bytes32,u.details: Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportionally to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to a request.
params._itemID: The ID of the item submission to withdraw from.
params._request: The request from which to withdraw from.
params._round: The round from which to withdraw from.

devdoc.title: GeneralizedTCR This contract is a curated registry for any types of items. Just like a TCR contract it features the request-challenge protocol and appeal fees crowdfunding.
